item.description:
CHRISTMAS DINNER DANCE
Friday, the 18th of December 2009
6:00 PM -12:00 Midnight

ACTIVE SINGLES (the hikers, cruise and trip folks)
All singles are welcome for a big C H R I S T M A S / HOLIDAY

DJ Top 40’s soft rock & requests till midnight.
HUGE DANCE FLOOR

This is a full dinner buffet with salad, several hot entrees & dessert. This is a BYOB. Soda, juice, ice, coffee & tea included in Price.

There will be 4 groups of Cash prizes
(Door prizes, Grab bag, Dance contest & Best Dressed Men & Women )

Please note this is a Dress up Affair:
* Men neat slacks, shoes, shirt with collar, sport jacket or suit
* Ladies Dressy. No boots, jeans, sneakers, or jean skirts


Location:
VFW Hall in Plainville Post #574
7 Northwest Drive
Plainville, CT
860-747-2993

General directions:
* North on Route 10
* Just before the Farmington line, turn right onto North West Drive
* #7 will be on the left

Approximate location/directions:
http://www.mapquest.c...


Please make checks payable to EECGLLC for $25 and mail to:

Charlie Gergley
19 Stony Hill Rd #6
Cheshire, CT 06410

Checks must be postmarked no later than Dec 8th, $35 after Post date up to & including payment at the door.


Call Charlie H (203- 271-2125) Cell 860-489-9611. for details


Active Singles is a 10 year old, non-profit Connecticut organization that brings together singles who enjoy participating in a variety of outdoor activities.

No official Hartford Area Hiking leadership is planned to be at this hike. Just mingle with the other Active Singles (you're one!).

NO Children, Singles only (this doesn't mean you can't have a boyfriend or girlfriend).

Active Singles
http://www.activesing...

Active singles dinner dance event listing
http://www.activesing...


=== Legal Stuff ===
By clicking on "Yes" or "Maybe" for this event you agree, warrant, and covenant as follows:

In consideration for accepting this entry, I, the registrant, intending to be legally bound, hereby, for myself, my heirs, my executors and administrators, do waive and release any and all rights for damages I may have against any parties or persons connected with the Hartford Area Hiking meetup group for and related to the above listed event. I attest and verify that I am physically fit to participate in any portion of this above listed event. I grant Hartford Area Hiking permission to use any photographs, film or videotapes of this event for any purpose.
item.how_to_find_us: May not be any hiking group leadership at the event... event is run by Active Singles organization.

group.name: The Hartford Area Hiking™ Meetup Group

item.name: Active Singles Christmas Dinner Dance in Plainville CT
